AMEND.UPLOAD-REQUIRED-DOCUMENTS: Upload required documents if it is needed

BULK-TRANFER.TITLE: Bulk Funds Transfer
BULK-TRANFER.DESCR: Type and reason of bulk payment

BULK-TRANSFER-TYPE.TYPE-DESCR: Select the type of bulk payment below
BULK-TRANSFER-TYPE.SINGLE-DESCR: The bulk payment will appear as one debit transaction on your account statement. A negotiated rate can be added in place of the daily rate for foreign currency payments.
BULK-TRANSFER-TYPE.MULTIPLE-DESCR: Each bulk payment entry will appear as individual transactions on your account statement. The daily rate will be applied by default for foreign currency payments.
BULK-TRANSFER-TYPE.REASON-DESCR: Select the reason for the payment  below.
BULK-TRANSFER-TYPE.SALARY-DESCR: Pay and process all employee salaries through internal and external bank transfers, mobile wallets, etc.
BULK-TRANSFER-TYPE.OTHER-DESCR: Pay multiple vendors, suppliers and service providers, etc. at a go

BULK-TRANFER.TRANSACTION-ENTRIES-SUBTITLE: Add transaction entries for the bulk payment manually or by uploading a template.
BULK-TRANFER.UPLOAD-FILE: Upload file or manually enter data
BULK-TRANFER.AUTOMATICALLY-PREFILL: Upload file to automatically prefill transactions or add transaction entries manually.
BULK-TRANFER.SINGLE-DEBIT: For a single debit bulk transfer, the aggregate of the bulk transfer amount will be debited from the account you select below.
BULK-TRANFER.MULTIPLE-DEBIT: Select a suspense account below for this bulk payment
BULK-TRANFER.SUPPORTING-DOCUMENTS: Please upload the document with the list of transations and any other supporting documents in PDF or Jpeg format. The maximum file size  per document should not exceed 10mb.
BULK-TRANFER.UPLOAD-DOC: Please upload the transaction document or transaction any other supporting documents in PDF or Jpeg format. The maximum file size per document should not exceed 10mb.
BULK-TRANFER.TOTAL-BATCH-AMOUNT: Your total batch amount is above 1 million KES or 10,000.00 USD. Attach the list of transactions or the uploaded template.
BULK-TRANFER.INSUFFICIENTNOTIFY: Your debit account(s) has insufficient balance
BULK-TRANFER.CAPTURE: Capture PF nos., Invoice nos., customer Reference nos., etc.
BULK-TRANFER.RATE-DEFAULT: The daily rate will be used by default
BULK-TRANFER.REVIEW-REQUEST: Review request and give additional comments if the request is returned or rejected. Add the information of the person contacted during callback.
BULK-TRANFER.SELECT-THE-MODE: Select the mode of delivering the statement to the account holder.
BULK-TRANFER.DETAILS-PROVIDED: The details provided by the maker are all okay.
BULK-TRANFER.NEED-CORRECTION: The details provided by the maker need correction.
BULK-TRANFER.NOT-GENUINE: The details provided by the maker are not genuine.
BULK-TRANFER.SUBMITTED: Batch payment has been submitted for approval.
BULK-TRANFER.NOTIFICATION-TITLE: There are multiple debit accounts listed on the uploaded file
BULK-TRANFER.NOTIFICATION-DESCR: For a single debit bulk transfer, only the debit account selected in the section below can be listed as the debit account for each individual transaction.
BULK-TRANFER.PAYMENTS-ERRORS: Payments with errors will not be credited
BULK-TRANFER.PAYMENTS-ERRORS-TITLE: Some of the transactions did not go through. If you submit this payment, the beneficiary accounts with error transactions will not be credited. Do you still want to continue
BULK-TRANFER.ALL-TRANSACTIONS: All transactions have been processed successfully
BULK-TRANFER.ALL-TRANSACTIONS-DESCR: All transactions have been processed successfully. Time taken to be credited to the beneficiaries’ accounts may vary depending on the mode of payment.
BULK-TRANFER.BELOW-TRANSACTIONS: Below are the details for this transactions
BULK-TRANFER.CONFIRM-BEFORE: Confirm the details before you proceed
BULK-TRANFER.PROCESSING: Batch payment has been submitted for processing.
BULK-TRANFER.PLEASE-UPLOAD: Please upload supporting documents in PDF or jpeg format. The maximum file size per document should not exceed 10mb.
BULK-TRANFER.FAILED-CIF: Failed to get customer cif data
BULK-TRANFER.DRAG-XLSX: Please drag and drop a valid xlsx file
BULK-TRANFER.UPLOAD-XLSX: Please upload a valid xlsx file

BULK-TRANFER.MISSING-AMOUNT-DESCR: The file should include a field for Amount
BULK-TRANFER.MISSING-PAYMENT-DESCR: The file should include a field for Payment reason
BULK-TRANFER.NO-CHARGES-ACCOUNTS: All accounts have errors, cannot continue
BULK-TRANFER.SOME-TRANSACTION-FAILED-TITLE: Some transactions have failed to process
BULK-TRANFER.SOME-TRANSACTION-FAILED-DETAIL: Some of the transactions have fialed to process. For more information, view the validation field of these transactions

BALANCE-CERTIFICATE.PROCESSED-SUCCESSFULLY: Account statement has been processed successfully.
BALANCE-CERTIFICATE.SELECT-ACCOUNTS: Select the account or accounts you would like to get the balance from
BALANCE-CERTIFICATE.SELECT-MODE-DELIVERING: Select the mode of delivering the balance certificate to the account holder.
BALANCE-CERTIFICATE.A-CHARGE-OF-1000-PER-PAGE: A charge of KES {{value}} per page will be debited from your account. Select the account to be debited below.
BALANCE-CERTIFICATE.STATEMENT-SENT-EMAIL: The statement will be sent to the email associated with this account
BALANCE-CERTIFICATE.YOUR-ACCOUNT-WILL-BE-CHARGED: Your account will be charged KES {{value}} for printing the balance certificate
BALANCE-CERTIFICATE.SELECT-ACCOUNT-DEBIT-CHARGES: Select the account to debit the charges
BALANCE-CERTIFICATE.PAYMENT-MODE: Mode of payment: Mode of payment
BALANCE-CERTIFICATE.SELECT-MODE-PAYMENT: Select a mode of paying charges associated with printing the balance certificate. If you waive the  charge, add a reason for doing do.
BALANCE-CERTIFICATE.DEBIT-ACCOUNT-DETAILS: Select an account below to debit charges.
BALANCE-CERTIFICATE.WAIVE-CHARGES-DETAILS: Waive charges accociated with printing and certification
BALANCE-CERTIFICATE.EMAIL-ADDRESS-DETAILS: Select or enter an email address to receive the statement

STATEMENT.SELECT-PERIOD: Select the period of the statement. Enter start date and end date for the custom date.
STATEMENT.START-DATE-CANNOT-BE-GREATER: Start Date cannot be greater that end date
STATEMENT.SELECT-TYPE: Select the type of statement you would like to generate.
STATEMENT.FULL-STATEMENT-MESSAGE: This includes both your debit and credit transactions
STATEMENT.DEBIT-STATEMENT-MESSAGE: This includes only your debit transactions
STATEMENT.CREDIT-STATEMENT-MESSAGE: This includes only your credit transactions
STATEMENT.DELIVERY-MODE-MESSAGE: Select the mode of delivering the statement to the account holder.
STATEMENT.SEND-EMAIL-MESSAGE: The statement will be sent to the email associated with this account
STATEMENT.CHARGED-PRINTING-STATEMENT: Your account will be charged KES 180.00 for printing the statement
STATEMENT.CHARGED-PRINTING-CERTIFIED-STATEMENT: Your account will be charged KES 1000.00 for printing and certifiying the statement
STATEMENT.CHARGE-ACCOUNT-MESSAGE: Select the account to debit the charges.
STATEMENT.GENERATE-ACCOUNT-MESSAGE: Select the account to generate statement.
STATEMENT.PROCESSED-SUCCESSFULLY: Account statement has been processed successfully.
STATEMENT.CONFIRM-BEFORE-PROCEED: Confirm the details before you proceed
STATEMENT.SELECT-MODE-OF-PAYING-CHARGES: Select a mode of paying charges associated with generate statement.
STATEMENT.SELECT-ACCOUNT-BELOW: Select an account below to debit charges.
STATEMENT.WAIVE-CHARGES-ASSOCIATED: Waive charges associated with printing and certification
STATEMENT.MODE-OF-PAYMENT-MESSAGE: Select a mode of paying charges associated with generate statement.
STATEMENT.DEBIT-ACCOUNT-MESSAGE: Select an account below to debit charges.
STATEMENT.WAIVE-CHARGES-MESSAGE: Waive charges associated with printing and certification

SEARCH.BEEN_BLACKLISTED_SANCTIONED_DUE_TO_UNDER: been blacklisted/sanctioned due to underlying issues.

SEARCH.PROFILE_CONSIDER_OPENING_AN_EQUITY_BANK_: profile, consider opening an Equity Bank account.
SEARCH.SEARCH_FOR_CUSTOMER_USING_THEIR_ID_NUMBE: Search for customer using their ID number, account number, CIF or mobile number

SEARCH.NOT_FOUND_DESCRIPTION: Please take another look at the customer's details and try again

OMNI-CHANNEL-PROFILE.FETCH-PROFILE-INSTRUCTION: Please enter at least one search detail below to fetch the customer’s omnichannel profile
OMNI-CHANNEL-PROFILE.RESULTS-TEXT: Below is the omnichannel profile associated with the customer’s details. If the profile has an issue, proceed with its soft deletion.
OMNI-CHANNEL-PROFILE.PROFILE-ERROR: This profile may have an error.
OMNI-CHANNEL-PROFILE.PROFILE-ERROR-MESSAGE: This could be because the profile was not fully registered, the customer has been locked out due to failed multiple login attempts or other reasons to do with the channels or linked accounts. Kindly double-check the fields in each of the sections below.
OMNI-CHANNEL-PROFILE.LINKED-ACCOUNTS-ERROR: The profile has no linked accounts.
OMNI-CHANNEL-PROFILE.CUSTOM-REASON-TITLE: Reason for soft deleting customer's profile
OMNI-CHANNEL-PROFILE.SOFT-DELETE-PROFILE-SUBTITLE: Omnichannel profile selected for soft deletion
OMNI-CHANNEL-PROFILE.SOFT-DELETE-OMNI-PROFILES: Omnichannel profile(s) selected for soft deletion
OMNI-CHANNEL-PROFILE.ADD-SOFT-DELETE-REASON: Add a reason for soft deleting the customer's profile and any additional comments.
OMNI-CHANNEL-PROFILE.UPLOAD-INSTRUCTION: Please upload supporting documents in PDF, png or jpeg format. The maximum file size per document should not exceed 1 MB.
OMNI-CHANNEL-PROFILE.SOFT-DELETE-SUCCESS-SUBTITLE: The soft delete request has successfully been completed. The customer's profile has been soft deleted.
OMNI-CHANNEL-PROFILE.SOFT-DELETE-SUCCESS-MESSAGE: The soft delete request has successfully been sent to checker for approval.

TRANSACTION-LIMIT.SELECT-ACCOUNT-TEXT: Select an account for limit personalisation. Once an account is selected, the account details will be entered automatically.
TRANSACTION-LIMIT.TRANSACTION-LIMITS-TEXT: Below are the transaction limits for all channels on the selected account
TRANSACTION-LIMIT.NO-TRANSACTION-LIMIT-MESSAGE: There are no transaction limits for the selected channel and transaction type.
TRANSACTION-LIMIT.DETAILS-INSTRUCTION: Please provide the necessary information in the fields below. If the requested limits exceed the maximum level, attach supporting documents below.
TRANSACTION-LIMIT.AMOUNT-ABOVE-LIMIT: Amount is above the maximum limit
TRANSACTION-LIMIT.TRANSACTION-ABOVE-DAILY-LIMIT: Maximum Transaction Limit is more than Maximum Daily Limit
TRANSACTION-LIMIT.END-DATE-ERROR: End date should be greater than start date
TRANSACTION-LIMIT.HIGHER-THAN-MAXLIMIT: is higher than the maximum default limit allowed for
TRANSACTION-LIMIT.PROCEED-INSTRUCTION: to proceed, you will need to attach the indemnity form below.
TRANSACTION-LIMIT.UPLOAD-INSTRUCTION: Please upload supporting documents in PDF or jpeg format. The maximum file size per document should not exceed 10mb.
TRANSACTION-LIMIT.PERSONALISATION-INSTRUCTION: Kindly ensure one option is selected.
TRANSACTION-LIMIT.LIMIT-PERSONALISATION-BRANCH: Limit Personalisation only at the branch
TRANSACTION-LIMIT.LIMIT-PERSONALISATION-BRANCH-MOBILE: Limit Personalisation only at the branch and on customer mobile channel
TRANSACTION-LIMIT.WRITE-ADDITIONAL-COMMENTS: Write additional comments for extra support
TRANSACTION-LIMIT.SUCCESS-MESSAGE: The limit amendment details have been captured successfully and forwarded to the checker for approval.
TRANSACTION-LIMIT.CUSTOMER-LIMIT-AMENDED-SUCCESS: The customer's transaction limits have successfully been amended.
TRANSACTION-LIMIT.ACCOUNT-SELECTED-MESSAGE: Below is the account where the new limits will be applied.

SAVE-INVEST.TITLE: Save & invest
SAVE-INVEST.SUBTITLE: How would you like to save?
SAVE-INVEST.SUBHEADER: Select the type of account you would like to open
SAVE-INVEST.BE-FREE-TO-SAVE: Be free to save as you go
SAVE-INVEST.BE-FREE-TO-SAVE-DETAILS: Help customers make appropriate investments to help them reach their goals
SAVE-INVEST.MAKE-FIXED-SAVING-CONTRIBUTION: Make a regular fixed saving contribution
SAVE-INVEST.MAKE-FIXED-SAVING-CONTRIBUTION-DETAILS: Customers can decide how often they want to save their money

FIXED-DEPOSIT.LABEL: Fixed Deposit
FIXED-DEPOSIT.HEADLINE: Fixed Deposit Account
FIXED-DEPOSIT.SUBHEADLINE: Customers can access their deposit amount plus interest at the end of a fixed period
FIXED-DEPOSIT.INFO-DETAILS: The funds of this account cannot be accessed until maturity. You can withdraw your investment before the maturity date. However, you will forfeit your interest earned to date and the fixed savings account will be closed.
FIXED-DEPOSIT.INVESTMENT-DETAILS-INFO: Enter the initial amount to be invested and add the deposit term to set the investment period. The currency of your fixed deposit account is similar to the currency of your debit account. To change this, select a debit account with a different currency.
FIXED-DEPOSIT.ROLLOVER-WITHDRAWAL-DETAILS-INFO: Select how the savings account balance will be reinvested at the end of the deposit term.
FIXED-DEPOSIT.PAYMENT-DETAILS-INFO: Enter the debit account details and select an option of crediting money into your savings account.
FIXED-DEPOSIT.SUCCESS-MGS: Your goals savings account has been successfully created.
FIXED-DEPOSIT.INFO-REQUIREMENTS-DETAILS: The minimum balance required to open a fixed deposit savings account is KES 25,000. Select an account with at least this minimum required balance.

CALL-DEPOSIT.LABEL: Call Deposit
CALL-DEPOSIT.HEADLINE: Call Deposit Account
CALL-DEPOSIT.SUBHEADLINE: Customers have immediate access to their funds plus interest, without any penalty
CALL-DEPOSIT.INFO-REQUIREMENTS-DETAILS: The funds of this account cannot be accessed until maturity. You can withdraw your investment before the maturity date. However, you will forfeit your interest earned to date and the fixed savings account will be closed.
CALL-DEPOSIT.INFO-REQUIREMENTS-DETAILS-01: The minimum balance required to open a call deposit savings account is KES 25,000. Select an account with at least this minimum required balance.
CALL-DEPOSIT.INFO-TITLE: Accessing the funds in this savings account may alter some investment details
CALL-DEPOSIT.INFO-DETAILS: Withdrawals are allowed in this account before the target amount is attained up to the miminum balance of KES 1,000.
CALL-DEPOSIT.SUCCESS-MGS: Your call deposit savings have successfully been reinvested.
CALL-DEPOSIT.INVESTMENT-DETAILS-INFO: Enter name of your savings account and the initial amount to be invested. The currency of your fixed deposit account is linked to the currency of your debit account. To change this, select a debit account with your desired currency.
CALL-DEPOSIT.PAYMENT-DETAILS-INFO: Enter the debit account details and select an option of crediting money into your savings account.

CDSC.HEADLINE: CDSC Account
CDSC.SUBHEADLINE: Customers can invest in shares and manage their portfolio
CDSC.SUCCESS-MGS: Your CDS account has been successfully created
CDSC.INVALID-PASSPORT-MESSAGE: Invalid Passport Number length, should be between 7 and 9 characters

ROLLOVER-ACCOUNT.SUCCESS-MGS: Your rollover savings have successfully been reinvested.

CLASSIC.HEADLINE: Classic Savings Account
CLASSIC.SUBHEADLINE: Customers can save any amount while earning compounded interest

GOAL.HEADLINE: Goal Savings Account
GOAL.SUBHEADLINE: Customers can access their deposit amount plus interest at the end of a fixed period

SAVE-INVEST.CUSTOM-TERM-MIN-VALUE: Custom term has to be above 12 months
SAVE-INVEST.WITHDRAW-HINT: The interest and the principal will be credited to the source amount upon investment maturity
SAVE-INVEST.ROLLOVER-HINT: Upon maturity, the principal, interest, or both will be reinvested into the fixed savings account
SAVE-INVEST.NO-SAVINGS-ACCOUNT: No savings accounts for this customer
SAVE-INVEST.DEPOSIT-PAGE-REVIEW: Review new savings sccount details for reinvestment
SAVE-INVEST.DEPOSIT-PAGE-REVIEW-TEXT: Review the details of the new fixed savings account where your amount to be rolled over will be reinvested. Select the debit account for one-time or recurring payments and adjust the payment frequency, start date, and end date.
SAVE-INVEST.ACCOUNT-ABOVE-MINIMUM: Account balance is above the minimum
SAVE-INVEST.ACCOUNT-BELOW-MINIMUM: Account balance is below the minimum
SAVE-INVEST.FIRST-QUARTER-MONTH-MESSAGE: The recurring payments will occur on the first day of January, April, July, and October up until the end date.
SAVE-INVEST.SECOND-QUARTER-MONTH-MESSAGE: The recurring payments will occur on the first day of February, May, August, and November up until the end date
SAVE-INVEST.THIRD-QUARTER-MONTH-MESSAGE: The recurring payments will occur on the first day of March, June, September, and December up until the end date.
SAVE-INVEST.AMOUNT-CREDITED-PER-FREQUENCY: Amount to be credited as per the frequency
SAVE-INVEST.CREDITED-ACCOUNT-AMOUNT: This amount with be credited to the selected account

SPECIAL-FOREX-RATES.TITLE: Special forex rates
SPECIAL-FOREX-RATES.ACTIVE-SPECIAL-RATES-TEXT: These are the special rates that the customer can apply to all their accounts
SPECIAL-FOREX-RATES.NO-RATES-ERROR: This customer does not have active special rates
